page.title: 02CHERRY BURTON-1
page.content: Group activities in C.Burton take place in various locations.In a village of 1345 residents,the average Sunday congregation is over 100 (the largest gathering of residents).At festivals every pew is taken.The church has a firm place in village life with a Sunday school,Bible study group,Pathfinders,pram services and a monthly village newsletter.The Summer fete,held at C.B. House,is well supported by over half the residents. The school and the Bay Horse pub are geographically the most central meeting places,though for rather different functions! The school holds events such as the annual summer fair and Christmas Crackers,both being fund raising events.The Parish Council,WEA, Yoga class and other evening groups also use the school.Self Help and social groups use the public house.
